title: Player Bots in AI game
body: Can Riot PLEASE fix the AI game mode, because it is just FILLED with bots on the player team who just feed all game. I report them for "Cheating" (using third party programs), but some of these bots are level 26 and above! How do they even get that high in level without being banned??

replies.body: they get that high because the program is just left there for weeks 24/7 building up XP. It's not too hard to comprehend really.
